projects: [{"title":"Mentoring software developers","start_date":"Dec 2017","end_date":"Present","description":"Helping developers become better in React, React Native, Relay, GraphQL, Meteor, Nodejs and other JavaScript technologies."},{"title":"Blitz","start_date":"Jul 2018","end_date":"Oct 2023","description":"2018: Delivered pixel-perfect frontend pages for 100,000 users, using React and Redux.2019–2020: Led full-stack development with Node.js, PostgreSQL, Express, and GraphQL, adding 200,000 users and driving revenue growth.2021–2022: Promoted to Engineering Manager, leading a team of 5-10 engineers, launching projects that pushed Blitz past 1 million users"},{"title":"Talksho","start_date":"Jul 2015","end_date":"Jul 2022","description":"Built a web application with React, WebSockets, PostgreSQL, Express, and GraphQL forreal-time data communication.Streamlined team workows to increase delivery speed by 20%."},{"title":"Reachify","start_date":"Jul 2016","end_date":"Jun 2019","description":"Architected MVPs for web, Android, and iOS platforms using React Native, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and Express.Improved time-to-market by 25%, enabling competitive advantage."},{"title":"Trakka","start_date":"May 2016","end_date":"Jul 2016","description":"Android, iOS and admin app development for Trakka using React, Meteor and Cordova."},{"title":"Sherpa","start_date":"Feb 2016","end_date":"Apr 2016","description":"Developed roster front-end for Sherpa using React and Redux"},{"title":"Wisboo","start_date":"Jan 2015","end_date":"Mar 2015","description":"Developed front-end using bootstrap"}]
